Detailed Description

Marker optimization problem description.

This structure contains the instruction to build the problem. I.e. which data should be loaded, what strategy should be chosen from resolution, etc.

Member Data Documentation

std::vector<std::string> roboptim::retargeting::MarkerProblemOptions::constraints

Constraints functions names.

std::string roboptim::retargeting::MarkerProblemOptions::cost

Cost function name.

std::string roboptim::retargeting::MarkerProblemOptions::markerSet

Marker set filename.

Any format supported by libmocap is acceptable. e.g. ".mars" Cortex file can be used

Referenced by roboptim::retargeting::buildDataFromOptions().

std::string roboptim::retargeting::MarkerProblemOptions::markersTrajectory

Markers trajectories.

Markers trajectories which will be used as the initial input of the optimization problem.

Any format supported by libmocap is acceptable. e.g. ".trc" Cortex file can be used.

Referenced by roboptim::retargeting::buildDataFromOptions().

std::string roboptim::retargeting::MarkerProblemOptions::outputFile

Final joint trajectory filename.

This file will be written at the end of the optimization process if it terminates successfully (or with warnings).

std::string roboptim::retargeting::MarkerProblemOptions::plugin

Solver plug-in name.

std::string roboptim::retargeting::MarkerProblemOptions::robotModel

Robot model to be used.

The robot model is used to determine the segment length.

Referenced by roboptim::retargeting::buildDataFromOptions().

std::string roboptim::retargeting::MarkerProblemOptions::trajectoryType

What type of trajectory should be used?

Possible options are:

  • discrete
  • spline

See roboptim-trajectory documentation for details.

Referenced by roboptim::retargeting::buildDataFromOptions().
